methods.name: setDocked
methods.comment:
Sets the docked state of this viewer.  An undocked satellite viewer will be in its 
 own window.

params.name: docked
params.comment: true if this viewer is docked; false if it is undocked

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if this satellite viewer is docked
@return true if this satellite viewer is docked
methods.name: isDocked
methods.comment: Returns true if this satellite viewer is docked

return.comment: true if this satellite viewer is docked

methods.javadoc:
Gets the renderer to use with this satellite viewer.
@return the renderer
methods.name: getPreferredVertexRenderer
methods.comment: Gets the renderer to use with this satellite viewer.

name: SatelliteGraphViewer
comment:
A graph viewer that shows a scaled, complete rendering of the graph with which it is 
 associated.
